text: Naked is a 1993 British American black comedy-drama movie directed by Mike Leigh and Jesse Peretz. It stars David Thewlis, Lesley Sharp, Katrin Cartlidge, Greg Cruttwell, Claire Skinner, Ewen Bremner, Elizabeth Berrington and was distributed by New Life Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1993 comedy-drama movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mike Leigh Category:Movies set in London
title: Naked (1993 movie)
